motions.title: Remove Economic Development Update from Agenda
motions.description: Motion to remove agenda item #3 (Economic Development Update) from the agenda.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval as Amended
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda as amended including: • April 8, 2024 meeting minutes • Contract with AECOM for North Shallowford Road Path Project concept design • Renewal of property & liability insurance with GIRMA (with items 7 and 9 moved to business items)

motions.title: Contract with Practical Design Partners for Winters Chapel Path Phase 2
motions.description: Award contract to Practical Design Partners, LLC for Winters Chapel Path Phase 2 design in amount not to exceed $415,000 including 5% contingency.

motions.title: First Quarter 2024 Budget Amendment
motions.description: Approval of first quarter 2024 budget amendment adding $2.6M in revenue, funding pay raises ($280,000), and reducing use of fund balance from $3M to approximately $700,000.

motions.title: Authorization for Local Matching Funds for LMIG Safety Improvements
motions.description: Authorization to provide local matching funds for Local Maintenance and Infrastructure Grant safety improvements.

motions.title: Resolution for Local Matching Funds for Federal Funding Request
motions.description: Approval of resolution of commitment to provide local matching funds for federal funding request for Village Crossroads and Winters Chapel Path Phase II projects.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for real estate discussion.

specialEvents.title: Sustainability Hero Awards
specialEvents.description: Presentation of 2023 Sustainability Hero awards to Jason Metzger (individual) and Oak Avenue Landscaping (organization).

specialEvents.title: Girl Scout Troop 19443 Bronze Award Project
specialEvents.description: Presentation by Girl Scout Troop 19443 on their Bronze Award project creating bird sanctuaries from scrap materials.
